title: 2. IRRI Agronomy Challege: Laser Leveling (4 January 2012)

tasks.task: Level the field for rice planting.
subtasks: Operate the laser-guided levelling attachment on a tractor.
Ensure the laser transmitter is properly set to a consistent level.
Monitor the levelling device as it moves across the field.
Verify the field's leveling with the levelling coach.

tasks.task: Prepare for drum seeding in two days.
